<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Kwoptarg Node Formatting

Represents an optional keyword argument (i.e. `foo` in `def m(foo: 42); end`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
def m(foo: 42); end
```

After:

```ruby
def m(foo: 42); end
```

## Formats multi-line

Before:

```ruby
def m(one: 42, two: 22, three: 29, four: 39, five: 10, six: 99, seven: 21, eight: 29); end
```

After:

```ruby
def m(
  one: 42,
  two: 22,
  three: 29,
  four: 39,
  five: 10,
  six: 99,
  seven: 21,
  eight: 29
)
end
```
